Chemical Actions and Uses/Specialty Uses of Chemicals/Dosage Forms/Vaginal Creams, Foams, and Jellies
Pharmaceutical Preparations/Vaginal Creams, Foams, and Jellies
Pharmaceutical Preparations/Dosage Forms/Vaginal Creams, Foams, and Jellies
Record.Description: Medicated dosage forms for topical application in the vagina. A cream is a semisolid emulsion containing suspended or dissolved medication; a foam is a dispersion of a gas in a medicated liquid resulting in a light, frothy mass; a jelly is a colloidal semisolid mass of a water soluble medicated material, usually translucent.
